nodes.text: The Northern Continent was one of the three major land masses on the planet Kathol. It was bordered by the Northern Ocean, Triad Sea, and Central Ocean. DarkStryder's Fortress was located on the Northern Continent.

The Northern Continent was the most habitable region on the planet, and the majority of the continent was covered int he ruins of a massive city that was originally inhabited by the Kathol species. Patches of the continent were terraformed by the Charr Ontee.
